promotions.text: The Latest Exclusive Funkos are Always at FYE!

aec.rpblb002821802.2.title: Post Malone - Beerbongs & Bentleys
aec.rpblb002821802.2.description: In the year and a half following his multi-platinum full-length debut, Post Malone continued his climb up the celebrity ladder, extending Stoney's success with the number one single "rockstar" and second-place follow-up "Psycho." [...] With a team of producers including Louis Bell, PartyNextDoor, Scott Storch, and London on da Track, the set benefits from livelier beats and varied atmospherics, especially when he steps outside of his narcotic comfort zone. ~Neil Z. Yeung

aec.mhv61180981dvd.title: Fifty Shades Freed
aec.mhv61180981dvd.description: In the third and final entry in this erotic-drama series, Anastasia Steele (Dakota Johnson) and Christian Grey (Jamie Dornan) are eager to begin their lives as husband and wife, and Christian even purchases a lavish home to make a fresh start. However, they soon find themselves facing both new temptations and threats from the past. Rita Ora, Luke Grimes, and Marcia Gay Harden co-star. Directed by James Foley, Fifty Shades Freed is based on the novel by E.L. James. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

ID: aec.wd14760000dvd.title: Thor: Ragnarok
ID: aec.wd14760000dvd.description: After being defeated in combat by his half-sister Hela (Cate Blanchett), Thor (Chris Hemsworth) ends up as an imprisoned gladiator on a distant world ruled by the Grandmaster (Jeff Goldblum). Now, he must work together with fellow Avenger the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), another combatant fighting for the Grandmaster's pleasure, in order to escape and return to Asgard before Hela can unleash the world-ending event known as Ragnarok. Tom Hiddleston, Anthony Hopkins, Idris Elba, Tessa Thompson, Karl Urban and Benedict Cumberbatch co-star. Directed by Taika Waititi (Hunt for the Wilderpeople). ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

fye.000000400377292419.title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
fye.000000400377292419.description: This sequel to the smash-hit comic-book epic The Avengers finds the iconic superhero team dealing with a threat of their own making: a sentient robot called Ultron (voice of James Spader), who was originally designed as part of a peacekeeping program. Since the events of the last film, Captain America (Chris Evans), Iron Man (Robert Downey Jr.), the Hulk (Mark Ruffalo), Thor (Chris Hemsworth), Hawkeye (Jeremy Renner), and Black Widow (Scarlett Johansson) have been working to take down various cells of a secret society of villains known as HYDRA. Their zeal to make the world a better, safer place inspires Tony Stark, genius billionaire and alter ego of Iron Man, to create Ultron in order to respond to additional threats that the Avengers aren't able to handle. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.bbgt1007.2.title: BTS - Love Yourself: Tear
aec.bbgt1007.2.description: The latest album from BTS is here! Collect all 4 versions to show your Army love💗 #FakeLove

fye.000000191685150200.title: I Am Deadpool Jacket
fye.000000191685150200.description: Model yourself after the Merc with a Mouth in this Faux leather Deadpool replica jacket!

fye.000000191685175142.title: The Avengers Infinity T-shirt
fye.000000191685175142.description: Enjoyed the new Avengers movie? Or are you yet to get to the theaters? Either way, geek out in this exclusive t-shirt that features all your favorite Marvel Universe characters!

aec.fox2332786dvd.title: The Greatest Showman
aec.fox2332786dvd.description: This musical about the life of entrepreneur P.T. Barnum (Hugh Jackman) depicts how he found fame and fortune by starting a circus in 1870s America. The Greatest Showman posits Barnum as the creator of modern show business, and a man who believed in celebrating those who were different instead of scorning them. Zac Efron, Michelle Williams, Zendaya, and Rebecca Ferguson co-star. Directed by Michael Gracey. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.wd14899900dvd.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi
aec.wd14899900dvd.description: Rian Johnson (Looper, Brick) wrote and directed this installment of the Star Wars saga, which picks up where The Force Awakens left off. Rey (Daisy Ridley) learns the ways of the Force from Luke Skywalker (Mark Hamill), and develops a telepathic bond with Kylo Ren (Adam Driver), who is struggling to master the Dark Side. Meanwhile, Stormtrooper-turned-Resistance fighter Finn (John Boyega) teams up with pilot Poe Dameron (Oscar Isaac) and maintenance worker Rose Tico (Kelly Marie Tran) for a risky mission behind enemy lines. Carrie Fisher, Domhnall Gleeson, Benicio Del Toro, Gwendoline Christie, and Laura Dern co-star. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.hbo1000697748dvd.title: Game of Thrones: Seasons 1-7
aec.hbo1000697748dvd.description: Are you still suffering from the latest season of Game of Thrones? Or can't wait for 2018 to be over for Season 8 to come out? Us, too! Let's keep calm and do another marathon...

aec.ctr48793dvd.title: Godzilla Collection
aec.ctr48793dvd.description: All of Godzilla movies that were ever made upto 2016, all in this single nifty collection!

aec.wd14767600dvd.title: Black Panther
aec.wd14767600dvd.description: Following the death of his father, T'Challa (Chadwick Boseman) is crowned the king of Wakanda, a technologically advanced country in Africa that has hidden itself away from the rest of the world. T'Challa is charged with defending the nation in his guise as the costumed superhero known as Black Panther, but his reign is challenged by a Wakanda dissident named Erik Killmonger (Michael B. Jordan), who wants to sell the country's natural resources to fund an uprising. Lupita Nyong'o, Danai Gurira, Martin Freeman, Daniel Kaluuya, Letitia Wright, Winston Duke, Angela Bassett, Forest Whitaker, and Andy Serkis co-star. Directed by Ryan Coogler. ~ Caleb Makay, Rovi

rovi.MR0004718812.title: Imagine Dragons - Evolve
rovi.MR0004718812.description: Imagine Dragons give away the plot with the very title of Evolve, the 2017 sequel to 2015's sophomore set, Smoke + Mirrors. Not content to stay in one emotional or musical spot, Imagine Dragons consciously move forward on Evolve, pushing themselves into a positive place, a transition that mirrors lead singer Dan Reynolds working through a heavy depression. Some of that darkness seeped into Smoke + Mirrors, but it's not heard here. ~ Stephen Thomas Eriewine

rovi.MR0004870289.title: Shinedown - Attention, Attention
rovi.MR0004870289.description: Kings of Hard Rock has returned with this album packed with intense emotional journey! We also have an exclusive vinyl that comes in transparent gold!

fye.000000878615090118.title: Skullcandy JIB Wireless Bluetooth Earbuds
fye.000000878615090118.description: Discover the convenience of Bluetooth listening with Jib wireless. Packing up to 6 rechargeable hours of battery life and an in-line microphone and remote with call and track control, you can live wirelessly without sacrificing any essential Features. Comes in 3 different colors!

fye.000000680079724061.title: Polaroid Cat Ear Headphones
fye.000000680079724061.description: Fan-favorite Cat Ear Headphones are back!😸 Comes in 3 different colors!

fye.000000732577741665.title: Rick and Morty Exclusive Strawberry Smiggles Cereal
fye.000000732577741665.description: You can eat the exact same Strawberry Smiggles cereal appeared in the Rick and Morty episode, "Rixty Minutes"! Celebrate the new season with some marshamallows 😋😋

fye.000000665398255007.title: Black Panther The Protector of Wakanda T-shirt
fye.000000665398255007.description: You will discover mind-blowing Ambigram lettering on each and every Red Chapter t-shirt. We've collaborated closely with Marvel to create a one-of-a-kind Premium collection that pairs Mark Palmer's world-famous Ambigram lettering with Marvel's iconic Super Heroes. We strive everyday to engineer clothing that we love to wear, and we are proud to share our passion with you. Red Chapter's Red Label Collection is designed and printed in America.

fye.000000889698311168.title: Funko Marvel Deadpool Pop: King Deadpool
fye.000000889698311168.description: Celebrate Deadpool 2 with this exclulsive Funko Pop! of Deadpool wearing a crown👑 & robe and holding a sword⚔️, and of course, a cheeseburger🍔

fye.000000191685229494.title: Deadpool - Deadgroot T-shirt
fye.000000191685229494.description: Deadpool, Groot? How about Deadpool doing his best Groot impression here with this FYE Exclusive T-Shirt?

rovi.MR0004881748.title: Arctic Monkeys - Tranquility Base Hotel & Casino
rovi.MR0004881748.description: It was inevitable that Alex Turner would incorporate the loungey swagger of his busman's holiday the Last Shadow Puppets into his main gig of the Arctic Monkeys, yet the soft louche touch of Tranquility Base Hotel & Casino comes as something of a shock. Chalk it up, perhaps, to the fact that Turner was a mere 32 years old when he unleashed Tranquility Base Hotel & Casino onto the world, a young age that seems older because Arctic Monkeys released their debut when he was just 19. Throughout Tranquility Base, Turner comes across as if he were much, much older than his actual age, cocking an eyebrow to a potential paramour who has the audacity to have never seen Blade Runner, and reminiscing about the '70s -- a decade he never saw. ~ Stephen Thomas Erlewine

aec.prt59172274000dvd.title: Avatar: The Last Airbender: The Complete Series
aec.prt59172274000dvd.description: Binge on this fan-favorite Nickelodeon animated series! Follow Aang's journey to fulfill his destiny in the world full of elemental magic!

aec.fox2310418dvd.title: Deadpool
aec.fox2310418dvd.description: In this irreverent spin on the superhero genre, mercenary Wade Wilson (Ryan Reynolds) agrees to participate in a top-secret experiment after learning that he has terminal cancer. When the procedure leaves him with advanced healing powers and a disfigured face, he reinvents himself as a wisecracking, spandex-clad antihero known as Deadpool, and seeks revenge on those responsible. Morena Baccarin, Ed Skrein, T.J. Miller, and Gina Carano co-star. Directed by Tim Miller. ~ Jack Rodgers, Rovi

aec.ctnw1000704139br.title: Rick and Morty: Season 3
aec.ctnw1000704139br.description: The latest season is on DVD & Blu-ray now! Let's get schwifty before the 70-episode new season hits 🕺 p.s. If you are not watching Rick and Morty yet, this is your chance to get caught up!

aec.fuko28671.title: Funko Pop! Rides: Game Of Thrones Night King On Dragon
aec.fuko28671.description: How much did you like all those twists in the seventh season of Game of Thrones? If your answer is yes, then head to the Funko section to check out this majestic Funko Pop! from the Rides collection. A must-have item for Funko Pop! or Game of Thrones fan!

aec.pppk701019.2.title: Five Finger Death Punch - And Justice for None
aec.pppk701019.2.description: Five Finger Death Punch is back to grace us with their new album! Our favorite track is Sham Pain with the rap-rock groove✌️ What's yours?

fye.000000047532910124.title: iHome Light-up Portable Bluetooth Speaker
fye.000000047532910124.description: Bring the party wherever you go with the iBT85 Bluetooth speaker with speakerphone. Stream music wirelessly from your Bluetooth-enabled device. Enjoy your music without missing a call. Aux-in jack to play audio from any device equipped with a headphone jack. Two stereo drivers for rich, detailed sound. Color changing mode for fun, fabulous color effects which can be controlled via free app. Operates on internal rechargeable battery, charges via included USB charging cable. USB port to charge mobile devices. iPX4- rated water and splash resistant. Works with free Melody voice powered music assistant app to play music from iHeartRadio, Spotify and more.

fye.000000889698279949.title: Funko Pop!: Avengers Infinity War Unmasked Iron Man
fye.000000889698279949.description: How much did you enjoy Infinity War? Get this Iron Man Funko Pop! for your Marvel collection. Only available from FYE!

fye.000000889698260909.title: Funko Pop! Rocks: Kurt Cobain (Exclusive)
fye.000000889698260909.description: Make some room on that shelf for the iconic front man of Nirvana! This exclusive Funko Pop! features Kurt Cobain with acoustic guitar in his tan sweater, just like when he performed on MTV Unplugged in 1994! You can get the album from us, too!
